website_summaries.verdict: It needs a little more refinement, but overall the Sony A7R II is a great camera for folks who need a high-resolution full-frame model in a more compact design than a dSLR.
pros: For the most part, the Sony A7R II delivers terrific photo and video quality in a compact, well-designed body
cons: Terrible battery life and a mushy shutter mechanism may negatively impact your shooting experience
Also, there's general highlight clipping in still photos and artifacts in some high-ISO-sensitivity shots that we hope Sony can improve via a firmware update
